text: Hey team, looking to work with Hayden Howard for Guzman y Gomez. Budget is approx $3,330 - need 3 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Facebook post, 1 x Twitter post, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel. 2 weeks exclusivity, 3 month engagement. Usage: 12 months. Start date: September 2025. Need to confirm: usage rights
